author: Staff Reporter
text:
The explosion of a mysterious object in the highly fortified Central Prison at Kalapet near here caused a flutter on Thursday night. Sources said the object wrapped in paper was hurled into the compound near the main gate of the prison. It exploded in the lawn near the main gate. However, no one was injured in the explosion.

On hearing a loud noise, the prison officials rushed to the spot and saw thick clouds of smoke.

The officials immediately alerted the Kalapet police who rushed to the spot and conducted investigation. Finger print experts were pressed into service.

When contacted a senior police official claimed that crackers used during a local temple festival had exploded in the complex. The nature of materials is not known and an investigation has been ordered into the incident, he said.
title: Explosion of mysterious object causes flutter
